com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Interface ScupMediaController.ClickListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ScupMediaController

    public static interface ScupMediaController.ClickListener
    This listener interface is called when user click button.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClick(ScupMediaController widget, int type)
      This function is called when user click widget button.

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        void onClick(ScupMediaController widget,
           int type)
        This function is called when user click widget button.
        Parameters:
        widget - ScupMediaController instance
        type - widget button type. One of ScupMediaController.BUTTON_TYPE_PREV, ScupMediaController.BUTTON_TYPE_PLAY, ScupMediaController.BUTTON_TYPE_PAUSE and ScupMediaController.BUTTON_TYPE_NEXT.
